name: Po-Tay-Do Karate
description:
As Sensei Crease you fight Po-Tay-Do Karates that are invading your Dojo. You fight them off by punching them, kicking them, and occasionally throwing ninja stars.

As Po-Tay-Do Karate attacks your dojo collect items to help you win the fight.

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Punch

Right Click: Kick

Space Bar: Throw Ninja Stars
